# Architecture

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%" .fragment}
<h2>Single node</h2>
```{mermaid}
flowchart TD
    id1((server_ ))
```
:::

::: {.column width="50%" .fragment}
<h2>3 nodes [3n] (p2p)</h2>
```{mermaid}
flowchart LR
  id0((server_ ))
  id1((server_ ))
  id2((server_ ))
  id0 --> id1
  id0 --> id2
  id1 --> id2
  id1 --> id0
  id2 --> id1
  id2 --> id0
```
:::

::::

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%" .fragment}
<h2>3n (master / slave)</h2>
```{mermaid}
flowchart TD
  master((master_ ))
  slave0((slave0_ ))
  slave1((slave1_ ))
  master --> slave0
  master --> slave1
```
:::

::: {.column width="50%" .fragment}
<h2>5n (cluster)</h2>
```{mermaid}
flowchart TD
  master((master_ ))
  slave0((slave0_ ))
  slave1((slave1_ ))
  slave2((slave2_ ))
  slave3((slave3_ ))
  master --> slave0
  master --> slave1
  master --> slave2
  master --> slave3
```
:::
